name: Storm Speaker
text: The might of primal storms—furious things of lightning, thunder, and rain—courses through your magic. Few druids walk the path of the storm speaker, for it is fraught with indomitable forces that can be channeled only temporarily, rather than truly controlled. The storm speaker dabbles with primal powers that dance and surge across the sky, free of all fetters.

features.stormSpeakerAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can also fly 8 squares as a free action
features.stormTouched(11thLevel): You gain resist 5 lightning and resist 5 thunder
features.dancingTempest(16thLevel): Once per round when you hit an enemy with a lightning or a thunder power, you can shift 1 square as a free action

flavorText: Once the storm begins, no mortal force can halt it.
